attributes.action: get Bill Oddie re-instated to Springwatch, he was clearly axed !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bill Oddie is a national institution and so to is Springwatch, but one cannot exist without the other.

Without Bill it will be the end of a great programme, it is Bills very enthusiasm that made me and many others watch, and get interested in nature.

Without him I shall not be bothering as it will be a lifeless, pedestrian sham !   He communicated his joy at just being there so well, it was infectious.

The BBC needs to listen to the popular mass of support and that means getting Bill back where he belongs for 2009 !

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
